name: Hello, Stranger! 2
description:
Today, you got several new messages from an unknown contact in your messenger. She says her name is Alice and she's been kidnapped. Who is she? Where did she come from? What happened in reality and why do you have to help her? Too many questions and no answers. Is it just a sick joke of your friends, a fraud attempt or maybe this girl really needs your help? You decide yourself. But remember, somebody's life depends on your decisions. It seems like it's time to find out what happened to that girl in reality.

Hello Stranger!
